Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The timezone offset for the location of the request.
If true, return all intents instead of just the top scoring intent.
The subscription key to use when enabling bing spell check
Docs.summary: Gets predictions for a given utterance, in the form of intents and entities. The current maximum query size is 500 characters.
